title: Bluey: Christmas Swim
description: Based on the hit ABC KIDS TV show!It’s Christmas Day and it’s the perfect weather for a family swim! The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas, Bluey gets a new teddy named Bartlebee and introduces him to the whole family. But the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home. Until Frisky convinces him to stay.
author: Bluey
